messages.text:
Right. Old habit.

Will fix.

> src/cmd/goapi/goapi.go:118: interfaces
> map[string]*ast.InterfaceType // "pkg\0name" -> interface
> Really?  \0?
> You can use structs as map keys now.

PTAL?

File src/cmd/goapi/goapi.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5576068/diff/10/src/cmd/goapi/goapi.go#newcode118
src/cmd/goapi/goapi.go:118: interfaces      map[string]*ast.InterfaceType // "pkg\0name" -> interface
Really?  \0?
You can use structs as map keys now.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
